webscript.shortname: Updates values in an an RM Constraint List
webscript.description:
Updates values in an an RM Constraint List If the authority is missing from the list then the value is deleted. If an authority does not exist in a list then the authority is added.
Only the authorities for the specified values are updated. If a value is missing it will not be affected.
JSON Parameter format "values" : [ ValueName, [ authorityName1, authorityName2 ]]
